snippet.title: Sure Footing - Steam Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
Visit Sure Footing on Steam:
http://store.steampowered.com/app/670730/Sure_Footing

Follow Sure Footing and Table Flip Games on Twitter:
http://www.twitter.com/SureFootingGame
http://www.twitter.com/TableFlipGames

For more information, head to our press page:
http://www.tableflipgames.co.uk/press

--

Sure Footing is a fast and frantic infinite runner about four friends saving their world from extinction. The world of Computra is under threat from the evil Ramrafstar and his ferocious minion Deletion Dave, who they seek to destroy the partitions that hold everything together.  Play as Pixel Pete, Polly Polygon, Blip and Plunk in single and multiplayer modes as they outrun Dave across the disk sectors.  Collect MIPs, avoid obstacles and overcome the challenges faced in the distant sectors of Computra.
